verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: Now I belong to Jesus, Jesus belongs to me, Not for the years of time alone, But for eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Once I was lost in sin's degradation, Jesus came down to bring me salvation, Lifted me up from sorrow and shame, Now I belong to Him;

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Joy floods my soul for Jesus has saved me, Freed me from sin that long had enslaved me His precious blood, He came to redeem, Now I belong to Him;
